title: Simulation-Based Social Practice Education for Fall Prevention in the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of age-related physical changes and basic safety protocols
context.additional_context: Experiencing elderly fall prevention strategies via smartphone-based VR simulations and role-playing, learning the importance of interdisciplinary approaches.

learning_goals: Explain at least three risk factors for falls among the elderly and propose prevention methods
Recreate fall situations and simulate response strategies through role-playing as elderly individuals in VR simulations
Develop a community-level fall prevention campaign plan through team-based project presentations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
